author: Marta Bellingreri
title: In Pictures: Living with the coronavirus
description: A photojournalist documents his partner's battle with COVID-19 as they are quarantined in their apartment in Sicily.
content:
Sicily, Italy - The coronavirus is living in our apartment. More specifically, it is living in my partner Marta's body: like a stone in the middle of her chest, lodged in her ribcage, making it difficult to breathe.
These are relatively mild symptoms, we kno… [+2063 chars]
